text: I would like to commend the excellent service provided by Archer Copier Pte Ltd. The technician, Rey, was punctual, professional, and very knowledgeable. He quickly identified the issue with our printer and resolved it efficiently. Rey was also friendly and took the time to explain the problem and how to prevent it in the future. Great service overall—highly recommended!

Great service! I was facing issues with my copier’s scanning and printing, but the team quickly identified the problem and fixed it efficiently. Everything is now working perfectly. Highly professional and responsive—thank you for the excellent support!

We have been using Archer for at least 6 years, their service and response has been very prompt and professional. Rey has assisted me on a couple of occasions and he is extremely helpful in resolving the issues.

Great customer service with fast and efficient responses.
Special thanks to Richard from the Sales Team for quickly solving my issues.
Really appreciate the help—thank you!
His service was awesome! Efficient, friendly, and professional. He went above and beyond to ensure satisfaction. I highly recommend him for exceptional customer care!
